articles.author: NEWS WIRES
articles.title: ‘A first’ from Mars: European spacecraft sends livestream from red planet - FRANCE 24 English
articles.description: A European spacecraft around Mars sent its first livestream from the red planet to Earth on Friday to mark the 20th anniversary of its launch, but rain in Spain interfered at times.
articles.content: A European spacecraft around Mars sent its first livestream from the red planet to Earth on Friday to mark the 20th anniversary of its launch, but rain in Spain interfered at times. The European Spac… [+2124 chars]

articles.author: Tom Hale
articles.title: Why Do So Many Cultures Have Dragons In Them? - IFLScience
articles.description: The dragon turns up in myths across Europe, Asia, Africa, and the Americas.
articles.content: Travel to any part of the world and its hard not to find dragons lurking in their mythological folklore. The ancient legends of Europe, Asia, Africa, and the Americas all feature the figure of a slin… [+2885 chars]
